name: Longsword
description: Versatile martial weapon that deals 1d8 slashing damage (1d10 when wielded with two hands).

name: Longbow
description: Two-handed ranged weapon that fires arrows for 1d8 piercing damage with long range.

name: Chain Mail
description: Heavy armor providing AC 16 but imposing disadvantage on Stealth checks.

name: Shield
description: Sturdy shield that increases your Armor Class by 2 while equipped.

name: Explorer's Pack
description: Includes a backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, torches, rations, and waterskin.

name: Healer's Kit
description: Contains bandages and salves; expend one use to stabilize a creature without a Medicine check.
